com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue

Interface YFSGetOrderExternallyUE


  • public interface YFSGetOrderExternallyUE

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document getOrderExternally(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
      The YFSGetOrderExternallyUE user exit is called before restore executes to provide the data that resides externally (compared to history tables).

    • Method Detail

      • getOrderExternally

        org.w3c.dom.Document getOrderExternally(YFSEnvironment env,
                                        org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                                 throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSUserExitException

        The YFSGetOrderExternallyUE user exit is called before restore executes to provide the data that resides externally (compared to history tables).

        Normally, restoreOrder restores an order that have been purged to history tables. If the order was purged to an external system, this user exit gives you the ability to pass an XML representation of the order that you wish to restore.


        Related Yantra Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD

        Pre-conditions: The user exit is called unconditionally.

        Post-conditions: The return value is an XML representation of order details, that resides externally, to be restored.


        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API. This is required for the user exit to either raise errors or access environment information.
        inXML - contains unique information about the order being restored. For more information, see the associated input files.


        Returns:
        A valid XML document that represents the details of an order that is to be purged. Ideally, these details reside on an external system.

        Note: The user exit implementation must make sure to set a value for the following key attributes, because they serve as foreign keys for other entities:

        Mandatory Attributes
        ElementAttribute
        OrderOrderHeaderKey
        OrderLineOrderLineKey
        ItemItemID
        PromotionPromotionKey
        ShipmentShipmentKey
        ShipmentLineShipmentLineKey
        WorkOrderWorkOrderKey
        WorkOrderAppointmentUserWoApptUserKey
        WorkOrderStatusAuditWorkOrderStatusAuditKey
        ScheduleOrderLineScheduleKey
        OrderReleaseOrderReleaseKey
        WorkOrderAppointmentWorkOrderApptKey
        ContainerShipmentContainerKey
        ContainerDetailContainerDetailsKey
        ReceiptReceiptHeaderKey
        OrderAuditOrderAuditKey


        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSUserExitException - This exception is thrown whenever system errors that the application cannot handle are encountered. The transaction is aborted and changes are rolled back.
